comment: She is awesome. Very hippy dippy and overall a great teacher. She gets off topic and she is quite funny. She lets you choose your topics and for your last project you create a video documentary. She doesn't have a final, TAKE HER!

She is my favorite teacher this semester! I love that she gives the class responsibility on picking topics for the paper and video assignments that make up the bulk of the class. So if you don't like the class the only person you can really blame is yourself. Also, protip: she loves conspiracy theories. She's awesome. Highly recommended.
She is funny. and i think an overall good professor. She adapts the course to the class. She made english fun to learn

One of the best professors I've ever taken. She taught me so much about writing and I never felt like I was getting behind in the class. You got to choose a topic to write about all semester so it made the papers way easier to write. Take her if you get the chance!

Dr. Beard is a really good teacher. She is nice and will help you with anything and everything she assigns. She doesn't require outside reading, just research for a paper you write. It's an english class, so you better proofread your papers before turning them in because you will get points off for silly mistakes. I would definitely take her again!
Dr. Beard is awesome. She is very helpful and makes sure you understand what you are doing in class. If you have a chance to take her I definitely would recommend her.
Easy going, didn't require a book. Very helpful and leaniant.

Professor Beard made English enjoyable.  There were 4 papers (3-5 pages long with annotations) and a final video project.  She lets you chose your own topics which makes the writing much more pleasurable. She is easy to get along with and gret at helping you out.  She will also review your rough drafts for your papers.  Take her for this class.

Prof. Beard was awesome. The work load is very reasonable. If you show up to class and show any amount of effort she will love you. She explains why you got each grade on every paper, is always willing to look at your paper before hand, and she breaks the writing process down so that every paper is painless. I loved this class
This professor is awesome. She isn't easy but she keeps the class fun and relevant to our lives. She is very helpful.

Very helpful teacher and she gives you plenty of time in class to work on assignments. If you skip class a lot do not take her as there is an attendance policy. Not too tough of a grader and she lets you know exactly what you need to do to improve. I would certainly recommend this professor for a freshman course.
She was very helpful!

She provided us with an ample amount of time each class to work on the assignments she gave us. She worked very hard to approach each assignment in different ways, to make sure that every student in the class understood what was expected of them. I have never had a teacher who put so much effort and understanding into each lecture.
Very cool, and not to hard. Fun project at end of semester.

Parker-Beard was awesome!  Fun teacher, made the class fun and interesting, and not boring.  Everyone said I would hate the class because of how boring it was, nope--it was fun!  Had a blast and learned a lot of things!  No tests, midterm is open book, and final is a group project!  You will love Parker-Beard!
CAN'T STAND HER!
Very nice and not boring at all! Doesn't like to lecture. A lot of homework at the beginning but its EXTREMELY easy.

GREAT PROFESSOR!!! She is always available for extra help. Most of the work is in class. There are 4 papers about 4 pages a piece for the entire semester which is NOTHING. Shes a creative teacher and her class was without a doubt an enjoyment. TAKE HER!!

She was a pretty good professor. She assigned a lot of work, but most of it was easy. There were no tests, just papers.  She does not grade papers too hard at first but get ready because towards the end she grades a lot harder. She is good about helping her students, as long as you come to class. She has a great personality. She makes the class as

I love her!! She is so nice and willing to help you with anything. She hates to lecture so she isn't one of those professors that bore you with powerpoints. She made class fun and we always got out early. There wasn't too much work and she gives extra credit. Definitely take her!!!

I know this is supposed to be a joke of a class but it really helped me a lot. It's a lot of work so you have to keep up with the syllabus but it will really help you get focused and be clear about what you want to do. I enjoyed it and I thought she was funny and helpful. She is really there because she cares.

She's a great Professor, She works with you if you have any problems at all.  GO TO HER CLASS!! She will love you if you have great attendance and give you a lot more slack.  She's great on late work, but don't make it a habbit.  She's funny and you watch a lot of YouTube videos. Kinda cool.  Ask about her conspiracy Theories.
AWESOME teacher.. very easy and lets you make up your work. There is a lot of homework at the beginning but it will stop eventually.

She is not bad at all, I really did like her class. She does talk loud and that took some getting used too. I liked how she made the class interesting and informative. Although there are times when she is talking and we have to write and I just wish she could be silent for one minute so I can think otherwise she's great.

I LOVE HER! She is so nice! You couldn't ask for a better english teacher. In class writings were a breeze, my friend and I wrote about the dumbest stuff and she loved us.   Very fair on papers, there were only 4 and she reminds you of deadlines.
Grades very easily on papers! She's young and really cool. I really liked her, class was fairly simple as long as you were there. Easy and I'd definately take her again!
Her class is pretty simple. We wrote 4 papers throughout the semester and only about 2 little quizes. She dosen't grade easy but a high B or low A is very possible. Overall the class was  fine.
